summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the improvement of the alley in Block M. "Dumar's Highland Park" addition and in Block M. supplemental plat of Blocks A-B-C-G-Lots 1 and 12 Block F and Lots 1 and 24 Block M, Dumar's Highland Park Addition, being a continuous alley between 12th Avenue Southwest and 11th Avenue Southwest from Southwest Holden Street to Southwest Webster Street; by paving the same; by doing such grading or regrading as may be necessary, providing for the necessary surface drainage.
